Described Disease.Described Disease: Parkinson's disease (PD), Dementia with Lewy bodies (DLB)

Experiment Method.Assay Method: Expression and Purification of α - Syn

Material used.Description: α - Syn proteins were expressed in Escherichia coli BL21(DE3)

Readout description.Conclusion: N.D.
Readout description.Result Description: N.D.

Readout description.Conclusion: N.D.
Readout description.Result Description: N.D.

Readout description.Conclusion: N.D.
Readout description.Result Description: N.D.

Readout description.Conclusion: N.D.
Readout description.Result Description: N.D.

Readout description.Conclusion: N.D.
Readout description.Result Description: N.D.

Material used.Material Name: α - Syn proteins from E. coli
Material used.Description: α - Syn proteins were assembled into filaments by incubation at 37 °C in 100 mM sodium acetate, pH 7.0, with continuous shaking

Readout description.Conclusion: E46K mutant polymerized more readily than the WT protein but less than A53T mutant
Readout description.Result Description: At high concentration (5 mg/ml), all proteins formed polymers. At low concentration (2.5 or 1 mg/ml), E46K mutant polymerized more readily than WT but less than A53T

Readout description.Conclusion: Increased propensity to polymerize
Readout description.Result Description: Quantified by sedimentation assay, E46A showed increased propensity to polymerize

Readout description.Conclusion: Increased propensity to polymerize but less K114 fluorescence
Readout description.Molecular Effect: Increased polymerization but reduced amyloid characteristics
Readout description.Result Description: Quantified by sedimentation assay, E83A showed increased propensity to polymerize, but generated much less K114 fluorescence

Readout description.Conclusion: Increased propensity to polymerize but less K114 fluorescence
Readout description.Molecular Effect: Increased polymerization but reduced amyloid characteristics
Readout description.Result Description: Quantified by sedimentation assay, E83K showed increased propensity to polymerize, but generated much less K114 fluorescence

Readout description.Conclusion: Increased propensity to fibrillize more than E46K mutant
Readout description.Result Description: At low concentration, A53T mutant showed more dramatic change in polymerization than E46K mutant

Material used.Material Name: α - Syn proteins from E. coli
Material used.Description: A fraction of each sample was incubated with K114 (50 μM) in 100 mM glycine, pH 8.5

Readout description.Conclusion: Formed amyloid structures, but less than A53T
Readout description.Result Description: E46K mutant formed amyloid structures as revealed by K114 fluorometry, but less than A53T

Readout description.Conclusion: Formed amyloid structures
Readout description.Result Description: E46A mutant formed amyloid structures as revealed by K114 fluorometry

Readout description.Conclusion: Formed amyloid structures with much less K114 fluorescence
Readout description.Molecular Effect: Increased polymerization but reduced amyloid characteristics
Readout description.Result Description: E83A mutant generated much less K114 fluorescence

Readout description.Conclusion: Formed amyloid structures with much less K114 fluorescence
Readout description.Molecular Effect: Increased polymerization but reduced amyloid characteristics
Readout description.Result Description: E83K mutant generated much less K114 fluorescence

Readout description.Conclusion: Formed amyloid structures
Readout description.Result Description: A53T mutant formed amyloid structures as revealed by K114 fluorometry

Material used.Material Name: α - Syn proteins from E. coli
Material used.Description: α - Syn proteins prepared at concentrations of 2.5 or 5 mg/ml in 100 mM phosphate buffer, pH 7.0

Readout description.Conclusion: Acquired β - pleated sheet conformation, converted from random coil more readily than WT
Readout description.Result Description: E46K mutant showed earlier acquisition of β - sheet structure than WT protein as indicated by CD spectra

Readout description.Conclusion: Relatively low CD signal despite positive sedimentation and EM results
Readout description.Molecular Effect: Increased propensity to polymerize but may have abnormal fibril formation
Readout description.Result Description: E46A assembled proteins yielded relatively low CD signal compared with other mutants

Readout description.Conclusion: Relatively low CD signal despite positive sedimentation and EM results
Readout description.Molecular Effect: Increased polymerization but reduced amyloid characteristics
Readout description.Result Description: E83A assembled proteins yielded relatively low CD signal compared with other mutants

Readout description.Conclusion: Acquired β - pleated sheet conformation
Readout description.Molecular Effect: Increased polymerization but reduced amyloid characteristics
Readout description.Result Description: E83K mutant showed CD spectra indicating β - pleated sheet conformation

Readout description.Conclusion: Acquired β - pleated sheet conformation
Readout description.Result Description: A53T mutant showed CD spectra indicating β - pleated sheet conformation
